synopses.small: Ruby struggles to come to terms with what has happened. Mel's suspicions increase.
synopses.medium: Ruby struggles to come to terms with what has happened. Mel's suspicions about Ray increase, leading to a shocking discovery. Bernadette finds herself in a tricky situation.

elements.title: The Apprentice
elements.subtitle: Series 14: 2. Comics

synopses.large:
Lord Sugar summons the candidates to the House of Illustration, the UK's only gallery dedicated to graphic art. On arrival, the teams are greeted by their business superhero as they've never seen him before. Via augmented-reality technology, Lord Sugar reveals that the candidates are to create a brand new comic aimed at eight- to 12-year-olds. They need to invent a new comic name, main character and original story as well as design a dynamic front cover using cutting-edge AR.

With comics printed overnight, they need to pitch to leading industry figures to secure orders. The task balances creative flair with productive pitching, and the team that forgets either could face a graphic showdown in the boardroom.
synopses.small: Lord Sugar tasks the candidates with creating a comic aimed at children.
synopses.medium: Lord Sugar tasks the candidates with creating a comic aimed at children. They need to invent a name, a main character and a story, as well as design a dynamic front cover.
synopses.editorial: Will the teams’ attempts to produce a new children’s comic have laughable results?

elements.editorial_subtitle: 2/14 Comics. Can the teams create a new superhero?

synopses.small: Ruby confides in Stacey.
synopses.medium: Ruby confides in Stacey.
synopses.editorial: Martin meets with his old friends.

elements.subtitle: Series 1: Episode 2

synopses.large: The search for baby Noah leads to an arrest, but it soon becomes clear that not everything is as it seems.
synopses.small: The search leads to an arrest, but not everything is as it seems.
synopses.medium: The search for baby Noah leads to an arrest, but it soon becomes clear that not everything is as it seems.
synopses.editorial: The search for baby Noah leads to an arrest, but not everything is as it seems.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 2/4 Can Alistair and Joanna cope with the pressure?

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 1. Nice Face

synopses.large: Eve is a security officer at MI5. She likes her job, her boss, her friends and her husband, but she is bored. When a Russian diplomat is assassinated in Vienna and Eve is given the job of looking after the witness, a casual bet about the identity of the killer gets out of hand, and Eve finds herself drawn into a cat-and-mouse game all across the continent, looking for a deadly, elusive and fascinating suspect.
synopses.small: When a politician is murdered, an MI5 security officer must protect the only witness.
synopses.medium: Thriller in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. When a Russian politician is murdered, MI5 security officer Eve must protect the only witness.
synopses.preview: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin.
synopses.editorial: Eve craves excitement. Villanelle craves destruction. They both need each other.

text.large: Contains some violent scenes and some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
text.medium: Contains some violence and some upsetting scenes.

text.large: Contains some violent scenes and some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
text.medium: Contains some violence and some upsetting scenes.

elements.editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A deadly, obsessive game of cat and mouse

synopses.large: After Kerry's trusting nature was taken advantage of and she became embroiled in a criminal enterprise with her devious father Martin, the police's net tightened around the Mucklowes. Kerry was left with a direct choice - save her father or save herself. Eight months on, the crew returns to the Cotswolds to investigate what has happened to both the Mucklowe family and the village community as a whole.
synopses.small: One-off special investigating the fallout from Kerry Mucklowe's criminal activity.
synopses.medium: Mockumentary. After Kerry became embroiled in a criminal enterprise with her father, this one-off special investigates the fallout and the impact on the village.
synopses.editorial: The cameras return to the Cotswolds in the fallout from Kerry’s brush with the law.

elements.title: The Cry
elements.subtitle: Series 1: Episode 1

synopses.large: Drama series about a couple who travel from Scotland to Australia to fight for custody of the husband's daughter. Joanna is struggling with life as a new mum, and the flight to Melbourne is a huge additional strain on her. Baby son Noah cries the whole way, to the very apparent dismay of their fellow travellers. Exhausted and emotional from the journey, the couple finally arrive in Australia, where unforeseen events - and the white light of public scrutiny - change their lives forever.
synopses.small: Drama series about a couple fighting for custody of the husband's daughter.
synopses.medium: Drama series about a couple who travel from Scotland to Australia to fight for custody of the husband's daughter.
synopses.preview: Drama series about a couple who travel from Scotland to Australia to fight for custody of the husband's daughter.
synopses.editorial: Tense drama with Jenna Coleman. Joanna struggles as a mum – but the worst is yet to come.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 1/4 Unthinkable tragedy changes a woman’s life forever

elements.title: Doctor Who
elements.subtitle: Series 11: 1. The Woman Who Fell to Earth

synopses.large: 'We don't get aliens in Sheffield.' In a South Yorkshire city, Ryan Sinclair, Yasmin Khan and Graham O'Brien are about to have their lives changed for ever, as a mysterious woman, unable to remember her own name, falls from the night sky. Can they believe a word she says? And can she help solve the strange events taking place across the city?
synopses.small: A mysterious woman, unable to remember her own name, falls from the Sheffield night sky.
synopses.medium: On one night in Sheffield, lives are changed for ever as a mysterious woman, unable to remember her own name, falls from the night sky.
synopses.preview: In a South Yorkshire city, Ryan Sinclair, Yasmin Khan and Graham O'Brien are about to have their lives changed for ever, as a mysterious woman falls from the night sky.
synopses.editorial: A mysterious woman falls from the night sky. She’s going to change lives for ever.

elements.original_title: The Woman Who Fell to Earth
elements.editorial_subtitle: 1/10 The Woman Who Fell To Earth. It’s about time...

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 8. God, I’m Tired

synopses.large: Villanelle is still on the run, but she has a hostage and she has a plan. Eve, Carolyn and Kenny are still in Russia, but old secrets coming to light have led to tension in the group. Can Eve finally get to Villanelle before the whole operation comes crashing down around them?
synopses.small: Villanelle is still on the run, but she has a hostage and she has a plan.
synopses.medium: Villanelle is still on the run, but she has a hostage and she has a plan. Eve, Carolyn and Kenny are still in Russia, but old secrets coming to light have led to tension.
synopses.editorial: Can Eve get to Villanelle before the whole operation comes crashing down around them?

elements.editorial_subtitle: 8/8 God, I’m Tired. Villanelle has a hostage – and a plan

elements.title: Press
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 6. Resonance

synopses.large:
Duncan attempts to spend quality time with his son Fred, but finds it difficult in the face of Sarah's open hostility, and she informs Duncan that she and her boyfriend Max intend for him never to see Fred again.

Holly struggles to separate her personal grievances from her professional ambitions. She adds to Duncan's troubles by threatening to publicly expose his relationship with Kristina, the sex worker with whom he has a longstanding arrangement. In anticipation of the splash, Duncan is forced to explain to Fred that he has been paying for sex, while Kristina has questions of her own for Holly.

James reopens communication with Jon Brooks, an MI5 source who is ready to blow the whistle on the government's Resonance programme. When Amina and Holly learn what the programme entails, they are convinced that the story will be the most important The Herald will ever run.

Emmerson presents Duncan with a seemingly impossible task, and Ed is forced to examine his own journalistic ethics, while Holly and Duncan go head to head.
synopses.small: Duncan attempts to spend quality time with his son Fred.
synopses.medium: Duncan attempts to spend quality time with his son Fred. Holly struggles to separate her personal grievances from her professional ambitions.
synopses.editorial: Holly struggles to separate her personal grievances from her professional ambitions.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 6/6 Resonance. Holly and Duncan go head to head

synopses.large: Lily, Martha and Ollie become Prefects and the power goes to their heads, meaning Rob may not be able to play an important football match. Jas and Sid lead the resistance.
synopses.small: Lily, Martha and Ollie become Prefects and the power goes to their heads.
synopses.medium: Comedy series. Lily, Martha and Ollie become Prefects and the power goes to their heads.

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 7. I Don’t Want to Be Free

synopses.large: Carolyn brings unwelcome news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than she’s ever been to Villanelle, and is finally going to meet Anna. Why would she give up the hunt now? Kenny has some revelations that make Eve question the true purpose of their entire mission. Meanwhile Villanelle is still in prison, now in solitary confinement, waiting for the rescue organised by Konstantin that never seems to come.
synopses.small: Carolyn brings news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than ever to Villanelle
synopses.medium: Carolyn brings unwelcome news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than ever to Villanelle, and is finally going to meet Anna. Why would she give up the hunt now?
synopses.editorial: With Eve finally meeting Anna, why would she give up the hunt? Kenny has a revelation.

elements.original_title: I Don’t Want to Be Free
elements.editorial_subtitle: 7/8 I Don’t Want To Be Free. Eve is closer than ever

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 6. Take Me to the Hole!

synopses.large: Villanelle is sneaked into a Russian prison to tie up one of her own extremely risky loose ends. But Eve and Carolyn are on their way to Moscow to meet Carolyn's contacts in Russian intelligence, hoping to get into the same prison to collect the final pieces of the puzzle.
synopses.small: Villanelle is smuggled into a Russian prison.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. A female assassin is imprisoned in Russia. Eve and Carolyn negotiate access.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle is sneaked into a Russian prison – and Eve and Carolyn are on their way too.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 6/8 Take Me to the Hole! A showdown in Moscow

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 5. I Have a Thing About Bathrooms

synopses.large: With the mole retrieved from Villanelle's clutches and secured in a safe house, Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information that could lead them not only to Villanelle but also to whoever is calling the shots. But with Villanelle still at large and in England, will any of them actually be safe until she's caught?
synopses.small: Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information.

elements.original_title: I Have a Thing About Bathrooms
elements.editorial_subtitle: 5/8 I Have a Thing About Bathrooms

synopses.large:
Stacey Dooley travels the world to uncover the hidden costs of the addiction to fast fashion. She sees for herself how toxic chemicals released by the garment industry pollute waterways that millions of people rely on. She witnesses the former Aral Sea, once one of the largest bodies of fresh water, now reduced almost entirely to dust. 

These are shocking discoveries likely to make you think twice about whether you really need those new clothes.
synopses.small: Stacey Dooley discovers the shocking environmental impact caused by fashion.
synopses.medium: Stacey Dooley uncovers the shocking environmental impact caused by an insatiable appetite for cheap clothing.
synopses.editorial: What’s the environmental cost of our love of cheap clothing? It's not easy watching.

related_links.title: Are your clothes wrecking the planet?

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 4. Sorry Baby

synopses.large: Intelligence from Berlin suggests the existence of a mole, prompting Eve to carry out a surveillance operation. Meanwhile, Villanelle is sent to England to assassinate a member of British Intelligence. She wonders if it could be Eve.
synopses.small: Villanelle is sent to England to assassinate a member of British Intelligence.
synopses.medium: Thriller series. Intelligence suggests the existence of a mole, prompting Eve to carry out a surveillance operation. Villanelle is sent to England for her next mission.
synopses.editorial: Forced to be part of a team, Villanelle must kill a member of the British secret service.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 4/8 Sorry, Baby. Eve and Elena follow the money

elements.title: Wanderlust
elements.subtitle: Series 1: Episode 6

synopses.large: Joy and Alan face up to the seismic changes in their lives and try to decide if the choices they have made are the right ones. After a tense encounter with Claire, a lost and lonely Joy takes a risk on love and goes on a bold journey. Tom's new relationship progresses in a surprising way, and Laura figures out exactly what, and who, she wants for herself. And Joy makes one final decision about the future.
synopses.small: Joy makes one final decision about the future.
synopses.medium: Drama series. Joy and Alan face up to the seismic changes in their lives and try to decide if the choices they have made are the right ones.
synopses.editorial: After a tense encounter, a lost and lonely Joy takes a risk – and goes on a bold journey.

text.large: Contains some strong language and some scenes of a sexual nature.
text.medium: Contains some strong language and some sexual content.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 6/6 Have Joy and Alan really made the right decision?

synopses.small: Stacey calls on Ruby to join her for a night out with Martin at the E20.

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 3. Don't I Know You?

synopses.large: When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel at a kink clinic in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate. While they follow a number of promising leads, Villanelle enjoys the cat-and-mouse nature of their proximity. But as they draw closer, Eve comes to realise that this is much more than a game.
synopses.small: When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate.
synopses.medium: Thriller series. When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel at a kink clinic in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle enjoys getting close to her nemesis Eve – and Niko’s worried about her safety.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 3/8 Don’t I Know You? Eve and Bill take a trip to Berlin

elements.title: Killing Eve
elements.subtitle: Series 1: 2. I'll Deal With Him Later

synopses.large: After being fired by Frank for the debacle in the hospital, Eve is stunned to be presented with her dream opportunity - a secret, off-the-books department, a mission she is truly invested in and the chance to build and lead her own team. Her target is Villanelle, who is still fulfilling her missions all over Europe, leaving a trail of bodies and intrigue behind her.
synopses.small: Eve joins a secret MI6 unit tracking Villanelle and the shady organisation she works for.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. Eve gets a dream opportunity to join a secret MI6 unit tracking Villanelle.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle is ordered to take a break – but she’s never one to do as she’s told.

text.large: Contains some scenes of a sexual nature and some violent scenes.
text.medium: Contains some sexual content and some violence.

elements.editorial_subtitle: 2/8 I’ll Deal With Him Later. Eve has a dream opportunity
